steps.name: Flash BIOS and image system
steps.expected: System should be flashed with the latest BIOS and show a GREEN screen at the end of the dashing procedure. System should reboot and unbundling should be successful.

steps.name: Set system date/time and add users
steps.expected: System should be unbundled. Admin and limited user accounts should be added.
keywords: set the correct Date and Time

steps.name: Verify HP Power Manager logs in Event Viewer
steps.expected: There should be no error for pre-installed HP Power Manager in the Event Viewer logs.

steps.name: Unhide files and extensions
steps.expected: All hidden files and extensions should be visible.

steps.name: Configure BSOD dump settings
steps.expected: Each BSOD should generate a kernel memory dump.

steps.name: Verify Desktop Support Utilities presence
steps.expected: HP Desktop Support Utilities must be present after dashing.

steps.name: Check for red screen and FAILURE.FLG
steps.expected: No red screen or FAILURE.FLG should be observed. If any, collect system.sav logs.

steps.name: Check HP Hotkey app presence
steps.expected: HP Hotkey app must be present after dashing.

steps.name: Verify app icon presence in Start menu and tray
steps.expected: App must be present in Start Menu and tray icon.
